sections.title: Advanced Materials Science and Nanotechnology → Ciencia avanzada de materiales y nanotecnología

items.english: Nanostructured materials exhibit unique properties due to quantum confinement effects

items.spanish: Los sistemas auto-ensamblantes se organizan espontáneamente en estructuras ordenadas

items.spanish: Los materiales inteligentes responden dinámicamente a estímulos y condiciones ambientales

items.spanish: Los compuestos de nanotubos de carbono ofrecen relaciones excepcionales resistencia-peso

items.spanish: La electrónica molecular permite computación a escala atómica

items.english: Additive manufacturing creates complex geometries impossible with traditional methods
items.spanish: La manufactura aditiva crea geometrías complejas imposibles con métodos tradicionales

items.english: Surface functionalization tailors material properties for specific applications
items.spanish: La funcionalización de superficie adapta propiedades de materiales para aplicaciones específicas

items.spanish: Los puntos cuánticos permiten control preciso de propiedades ópticas y electrónicas

They make materials heavier
They eliminate all material properties

listening.audio: What makes metamaterials unique compared to conventional materials?

They're always more expensive
They only work at room temperature

listening.audio: Why are smart materials important for engineering applications?

They never break or wear out
They eliminate the need for sensors

sections.title: Advanced Robotics and Automation Systems → Robótica avanzada y sistemas de automatización

items.english: Collaborative robots safely interact with humans in shared workspaces
items.spanish: Los robots colaborativos interactúan de manera segura con humanos en espacios de trabajo compartidos

items.english: Autonomous navigation systems enable robots to operate in unknown environments
items.spanish: Los sistemas de navegación autónoma permiten a robots operar en ambientes desconocidos

items.english: Machine learning enhances robot perception and decision-making capabilities
items.spanish: El aprendizaje automático mejora capacidades de percepción y toma de decisiones de robots

items.english: Swarm robotics coordinates multiple robots for complex collective behaviors
items.spanish: La robótica de enjambre coordina múltiples robots para comportamientos colectivos complejos

items.english: Soft robotics utilizes flexible materials for safe human-robot interaction
items.spanish: La robótica suave utiliza materiales flexibles para interacción segura humano-robot

items.english: Haptic feedback systems provide tactile sensation for remote manipulation
items.spanish: Los sistemas de retroalimentación háptica proporcionan sensación táctil para manipulación remota

items.english: Bio-inspired robotics mimics natural systems for improved performance
items.spanish: La robótica bio-inspirada imita sistemas naturales para rendimiento mejorado

items.english: Predictive maintenance algorithms optimize robot operation and reliability
items.spanish: Los algoritmos de mantenimiento predictivo optimizan operación y confiabilidad de robots

items.english: Edge computing enables real-time robot control and response
items.spanish: El edge computing permite control y respuesta de robots en tiempo real

items.english: Human-robot interfaces facilitate intuitive control and programming
items.spanish: Las interfaces humano-robot facilitan control y programación intuitivos

listening.audio: What advantages do collaborative robots offer in manufacturing?

They replace all human workers
They only work in isolation

listening.audio: How does swarm robotics benefit from collective behavior?
options: Multiple simple robots can accomplish complex tasks through coordination
Each robot works completely independently
It only works with identical robots

listening.audio: Why is soft robotics important for human-robot interaction?
options: Soft materials reduce injury risk and enable safer physical contact
They're cheaper to manufacture
They move faster than rigid robots

sections.title: Autonomous Systems and Control Theory → Sistemas autónomos y teoría de control

items.english: Model predictive control optimizes system performance over future time horizons
items.spanish: El control predictivo de modelos optimiza rendimiento del sistema sobre horizontes de tiempo futuros

items.english: Adaptive control systems adjust parameters automatically based on changing conditions
items.spanish: Los sistemas de control adaptivo ajustan parámetros automáticamente basados en condiciones cambiantes

items.english: Sensor fusion combines multiple data sources for improved state estimation
items.spanish: La fusión de sensores combina múltiples fuentes de datos para estimación mejorada de estado

items.english: Nonlinear control techniques handle complex system dynamics and constraints
items.spanish: Las técnicas de control no lineal manejan dinámicas complejas del sistema y restricciones

items.english: Fault detection algorithms identify system malfunctions before catastrophic failure
items.spanish: Los algoritmos de detección de fallas identifican mal funcionamientos del sistema antes de falla catastrófica

items.english: Distributed control systems coordinate multiple subsystems for global objectives
items.spanish: Los sistemas de control distribuido coordinan múltiples subsistemas para objetivos globales

items.english: Real-time optimization balances performance objectives with operational constraints
items.spanish: La optimización en tiempo real equilibra objetivos de rendimiento con restricciones operacionales

items.english: Robust control maintains stability despite model uncertainties and disturbances
items.spanish: El control robusto mantiene estabilidad a pesar de incertidumbres del modelo y perturbaciones

items.english: Machine learning controllers adapt to complex environments through experience
items.spanish: Los controladores de aprendizaje automático se adaptan a ambientes complejos a través de experiencia

items.english: Safety-critical systems require rigorous verification and validation processes
items.spanish: Los sistemas críticos de seguridad requieren procesos rigurosos de verificación y validación

listening.audio: How does model predictive control improve system performance?
options: It predicts future behavior and optimizes control actions over a time horizon
It only reacts to current conditions
It eliminates all system disturbances

listening.audio: What is the advantage of sensor fusion in autonomous systems?
options: It combines data from multiple sensors to create more accurate and reliable information
It reduces the number of sensors needed
It makes sensors more expensive

listening.audio: Why is robust control important for real-world applications?
options: It maintains performance even when system models are imperfect or conditions change
It only works in laboratory conditions
It eliminates the need for feedback

sections.title: Environmental Engineering and Sustainability → Ingeniería ambiental y sostenibilidad

items.english: Water treatment technologies remove contaminants through physical, chemical, and biological processes
items.spanish: Las tecnologías de tratamiento de agua remueven contaminantes a través de procesos físicos, químicos y biológicos

items.english: Air quality monitoring systems track pollutants and support public health decisions
items.spanish: Los sistemas de monitoreo de calidad del aire rastrean contaminantes y apoyan decisiones de salud pública

items.english: Waste-to-energy conversion transforms municipal solid waste into useful power
items.spanish: La conversión de residuos a energía transforma residuos sólidos municipales en energía útil

items.english: Phytoremediation uses plants to extract pollutants from contaminated environments
items.spanish: La fitorremediación usa plantas para extraer contaminantes de ambientes contaminados

items.english: Carbon capture and storage technologies mitigate greenhouse gas emissions
items.spanish: Las tecnologías de captura y almacenamiento de carbono mitigan emisiones de gases de efecto invernadero

items.english: Green infrastructure integrates natural systems with urban development
items.spanish: La infraestructura verde integra sistemas naturales con desarrollo urbano

items.english: Environmental impact assessments evaluate project effects on ecosystems
items.spanish: Las evaluaciones de impacto ambiental evalúan efectos de proyectos en ecosistemas

items.english: Renewable energy systems reduce dependence on fossil fuel resources
items.spanish: Los sistemas de energía renovable reducen dependencia en recursos de combustibles fósiles

items.english: Circular economy principles minimize waste through resource recovery and reuse
items.spanish: Los principios de economía circular minimizan residuos a través de recuperación y reutilización de recursos

items.english: Climate adaptation strategies prepare infrastructure for changing environmental conditions
items.spanish: Las estrategias de adaptación climática preparan infraestructura para condiciones ambientales cambiantes

listening.audio: How does phytoremediation help clean contaminated sites?
options: Plants absorb or break down pollutants, providing a natural and cost-effective cleanup method
It only works for water contamination
It makes contamination worse

listening.audio: What role does green infrastructure play in urban planning?
options: It uses natural systems to manage stormwater, reduce pollution, and improve quality of life
It only involves planting trees
It replaces all traditional infrastructure

listening.audio: Why is carbon capture and storage important for climate change?
options: It removes CO2 from the atmosphere or prevents its release, helping reduce global warming
It increases carbon emissions
It only works for small facilities
